title: Catchwords: ideas for spelling
creator_credit: O. Hollander and Educational Technology Unit, Toorak State College
brief_description: Charles Cripps, author of the spelling manual “Catchwords” is interviewed by Sue Brockfield and Howard Mould. Cripps outlines several strategies useful for the teaching of spelling. He strongly advocates the “look, cover, write and check” system which is explained during the interview.
